Tabs

Add tabs to display only certain informations.

File to include

@include "components/tabs";

Align left

  • First tab
  • Second tab
  • Third tab
<div class="tabs tabs-left">
    <ul class="tablinks" role="tablist">
            <li class="active"><a role="tab">First tab</a></li>
            <li><a role="tab">Second tab</a></li>
            <li><a role="tab">Third tab</a></li>
    </ul>
</div>

Align center

  • First tab
  • Second tab
  • Third tab
<div class="tabs tabs-center">
    <ul class="tablinks" role="tablist">
            <li class="active"><a role="tab">First tab</a></li>
            <li><a role="tab">Second tab</a></li>
            <li><a role="tab">Third tab</a></li>
    </ul>
</div>

Align right

  • First tab
  • Second tab
  • Third tab
<div class="tabs tabs-right">
    <ul class="tablinks" role="tablist">
            <li class="active"><a role="tab">First tab</a></li>
            <li><a role="tab">Second tab</a></li>
            <li><a role="tab">Third tab</a></li>
    </ul>
</div>
